General.Name: Pasofino Gold Limited
General.Description: Pasofino Gold Limited engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties. It has an option to acquire a 49% interest in the Dugbe gold project covering an area of 2,559 square kilometers situated in southern Liberia. The company was formerly known as Enforcer Gold Corp. and changed its name to Pasofino Gold Limited in October 2019. Pasofino Gold Limited was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 366 Bay Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 4B2
